casebody.data:
RONCA v. WENDELL & EVANS CO. (Supreme Court, Appellate Division, Second Department. January 15, 1915.) Appeal from Trial Term, Kings County. Action by Giovanni C. Bonca against the Wendell & Evans Company. From a judgment for plaintiff, and from an order denying a new trial, defendant appeals. Affirmed. See, also, 150 N. Y. Supp. 1109.

Argued before JENKS, P. J., and BURR, STAPLETON, RICH, and PUTNAM, JJ.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment and order unanimously affirmed, with costs. See Fannie Ronca v. Wendell & Evans Co., 151 N. Y. Supp. 257, decided herewith.
